title: Antiarrhythmics for maintaining sinus rhythm after cardioversion of atrial fibrillation
authors: Lucie Valembois, Etienne Audureau, Andrea Takeda, Witold Jarzebowski, Joël Belmin, Carmelo Lafuente‐Lafuente
reference: Valembois, L., Audureau, E., Takeda, A., Jarzebowski, W., Belmin, J., & Lafuente-Lafuente, C. (2019). Antiarrhythmics for maintaining sinus rhythm after cardioversion of atrial fibrillation. Cochrane Database of Systematic Reviews. https://doi.org/10.1002/14651858.CD005049.pub4
